title: The Blitz Obstacle Course Race
text:
The Blitz Obstacle Course Race Where 
10:00 a.m. Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015 Categories 
Events, Kids | Family, Outdoors | Recreation The Blitz 2-mile Obstacle Course Race (Notre Dame-Cathedral Latin School, 13000 Auburn Rd., Chardon) The Blitz, a wild 2-mile 10-plus Obstacle Course Race for Kids, is designed for kids ages 7-17 and their parents. This is a run-for-fun and not competitively timed. Conquer professionally built cargo nets, wall climbs, water slides, hurdles, crawl unders and hay bale climbs, runs and so much more! We promise a fit and filthy day at the beautiful Notre Dame-Cathedral Latin campus in Chardon. Parents are welcome to participate...if they can keep up! Come for the run and stay for the food and music. Each participant ages 7-17 will receive The Blitz t-shirt, wrist band, and finishing medal FREE! Race heats are every 20 minutes. Register early to get the time of your choice. Consider running as a team with a theme! Check out The Blitz Facebook photos and video. Register online at www.theblitz.events and like us on Facebook. Be sure to see The Blitz event fall schedule. â€¢do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers $30which includes t-shirt, wrist band, finishing medal. Register on-line at www.theblitz.events. Register a group for a discount. Be a team with a theme! Related
